entry.title: Israel Steps Up Attacks in Southern Gaza Following Collapse of Cease-Fire
entry.content: The intensified strikes opened what could be the next phase of Israelâ€™s war against Hamas, as negotiators pushed to reinstate a pause in the fighting.

entry.title: What's at Stake at COP28 in Dubai
entry.content: Negotiations are set to center on a review of progress in reducing global warming, the future of fossil fuels, financing and a fund to pay for climate damage.

entry.title: Welcome to the Tiny Island Paradise Fending Off China
entry.content: Thitu Island in the South China Sea has 250 residents, and they are determined to stay despite ever-present Chinese ships on the horizon.
